message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which is worth a lot to me. I'm willing to let it go for $13,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget.

Bob, I understand you have a limited budget, and I appreciate your interest. I can't go as low as $12,000, but I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is still a great deal for you, considering the value you've mentioned.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can do $11,800. That's as low as I can go.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,800 is just too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,500?  That's a good compromise, and still a great deal for you considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I can do $12,250. That's the best I can do.
